case "admin_buy_point":	{			if(!empty($_POST['points'])&&is_numeric($_POST['points'])) //如果points的参数不为整形，就进入下一个if语句，那么我们就改为字符型		{			$admin->buy_point($_POST['points']);		}		if($_GET['statu']==1) 		{			$admin->use_point($_GET['price']);//有条件statu=1就进入了use_point函数，我们跟踪use_point函数			msg("main.php?action=admin_buy_point");		}			include_once("includes/point_inc.php");		$tpl->assign("myrank",point_ranks($buid));		@include_once("includes/point_inc.php");		$tpl->assign("rates",$point_config['rmb_point']);		$page= "admin_buy_point.htm";		break;	}admin_class.php中	function use_point($point)	{		global $buid;		$t=time();		$sql="update ".ALLUSER." set point=point+$point where userid=$buid";//直接就把当前用户的积分就更新了		$re=$this->db->query($sql);		return $re;	}
